attributes.action: Our schools are struggling due to funding cuts. Redirect foreign aid to schools
attributes.additional_details: Schools are discussing four day weeks, increased class sizes and parent contributions as they struggle to afford to educate children in state schools due to increasing pupil numbers. It is the children of the less affluent in society those who cannot afford private education who will suffer making the divide between rich and poor educated even wider. Although it is commendable to help other countries it should not be at the expense of our children's future and their education
attributes.background: Our schools are struggling http://m.bristolpost.co.uk/olympus-headteacher-asks-parents-for-donations-as-budget-cuts-drive-schools-to-crisis-point/story-30155492-detail/story.html We are paying vast amounts to countries such as India who state they have not requested or need. Redirect to schools
